message.content:
cs.SE, cs.DC, cs.PL, cs.MS, cs.DS 

Reasoning: The paper discusses the use of object-oriented programming languages and reflection in scientific coding, which falls under the category of software engineering (cs.SE). It also mentions the use of MPI for parallel programming, which falls under distributed, parallel, and cluster computing (cs.DC). The paper also introduces the Classdesc system, which simplifies coding in C++, a programming language that falls under programming languages (cs.PL). The use of Graphcode, a data parallel programming environment, suggests that the paper may also fall under the category of modeling and simulation (cs.MS) and data structures and algorithms (cs.DS).
